topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557839b86368725be0004f3b#post_557839b86368725be0004f3b
Honestly he should have.

The thing so far is I don't know weather to be mad because Arin legit just blew him off like that or be mad at Ross for thinking it was ok to _spend $700 on mounts_.

Like Jesus Christ man. 

So far its kind of a flip flop of emotions for me cuz I do agree this challenge should at least be fun and Ross isn't letting them have fun.

But I do agree as well that they should at least listen to what he's saying. 

In the end the Money is going to go to whoever wins/Charity anyhow. So its probably better to just have fun.

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55783d0e6368723f1d00141c#post_55783d0e6368723f1d00141c
I used to like games like WoW kinda sorta. I started playing AQW (Adventure Quest Worlds) literally the moment it launched, and played it for like 10 months and i knew every single thing about the game, but i had to stop playing around then because that's when our computer died.

We didn't get a new one for 6 months, and even when we did get it, i didn't go back to playing.

Roughly 3 months ago i went back to AQW cuz i wanted to enjoy the game again. I was just like "uh, the fuck is this, the fuck is that, the FUCK are these???? fuck this" I no longer have the patience to sit down and learn a game that huge.
